item.description:
The Event's MC is Kennedy from the Karson and Kennedy morning talk show on Mix 104.1. You will love her!!!


Accelerated Cure Project for MS will be hosting the Annual Shimmer and Shine: Stepping Out To Cure MS Shoe Ball. Come enjoy a night of fashion, fun, and friends and help support ACP!


The night will consist of: cocktails, hors d'oevrs, dancing, live & silent auctions, a shoe "walk-off", local celebrity sightings, and a complimentary swag bag.


Tickets are $75.


This event sold out quickly last year. Make sure to buy your tickets early!
Tickets can be purchased here: https://www.acceleratedcure.org/news/shimmer-and-shine-event.


Bring a friend!!!

Please contact me if you want to sponsor the ACP with a Cash incentive. We have over 30 Silent Auction Items on Hand and more to come and 3 Live Auction Items includding Dinner at for 4 with the Boston Fire Department!!!!
item.name: Shimmer and Shine Stepping Out to Cure MS Shoe Ball.
